packageMeta.name: purescript-node-datagram
packageMeta.description: A PureScript wrapper for Node's UDP/Datagram APIs

modules.name: Node.Datagram
modules.comments: This module defines low-level bindings to the Node dgram module.

declarations.comments: The type of a Datagram socket object
declarations.title: Socket

declarations.comments: The effect associated with using the Datagram module.
declarations.title: DATAGRAM

declarations.comments: Type of Datagram socket
declarations.title: SocketType

declarations.comments: Socket address information
declarations.title: SocketInfo

declarations.comments: Creates a Socket data structure
declarations.title: createSocket

declarations.comments: Listen for datagram messages. A bound datagram socket keeps the Node.js process running to receive datagram messages
declarations.title: bindSocket

declarations.comments: Close the underlying socket and stop listening for data on it
declarations.title: close

declarations.comments: Function that will be called when a new datagram is available on a socket
declarations.title: onMessage

declarations.comments: Function that will be called whenever a socket begins listening for datagram messages
declarations.title: onListening

declarations.comments: Function that will be called after a socket is closed with `close`
declarations.title: onClose

declarations.comments: Function that will be called whenever any error occurs
declarations.title: onError

declarations.comments: Broadcasts a datagram on the socket
declarations.title: send

declarations.comments: Broadcasts a datagram on the socket
declarations.title: sendString

declarations.comments: Return the address information for a socket
declarations.title: address

declarations.comments: Sets or clears the SO_BROADCAST socket option
declarations.title: setBroadcast

declarations.comments: Sets or clears the IP_MULTICAST_LOOP socket option
declarations.title: setMulticastLoopback

declarations.comments: Sets the `IP_TTL` socket option
declarations.title: setTTL

declarations.comments: Sets the `IP_MULTICAST_TTL` socket option
declarations.title: setMulticastTTL

declarations.comments: Tell the kernel to join a multicast group
declarations.title: addMembership

declarations.comments: Instruct the kernel to leave a multicast group
declarations.title: dropMembership

declarations.comments: Exclude the socket from the reference counting that keeps the Node.js process active, allowing the process to exit even if the socket is still listening
declarations.title: unref

declarations.comments: Add the socket back to the reference counting and restore the default behavior
declarations.title: ref
